text:
Currently using <https://juliastats.org/GLM.jl/v0.11/>

Is it possible to create a custom Link function?

I’m trying to go for Log2 as opposed to just Log.

I’m assuming the SE and P values will also change accordingly right?

elements.text:
Is it possible to create a custom Link function?

I’m trying to go for Log2 as opposed to just Log.

I’m assuming the SE and P values will also change accordingly right?

text: I think so (but I can't guarantee it). You can have a look at <https://github.com/JuliaStats/GLM.jl/blob/master/src/glmtools.jl> to see how links are implemented.
